text:
Disclosure: My Family Finances may receive financial compensation from a merchant if a reader chooses to purchase goods/services via links on this website. You will never be obligated to make any purchases and there is no additional cost to the reader by using these links. I will only recommend products or services that I have tried and tested myself and believe will add value to your financial wellbeing.

This site is for the purpose of financial education and coachingso is therefore not regulated by The Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).
